00016         protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)
00017         {
00018             
00019             if (Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID] == null)
00020             {
00021                 Session.Abandon();
00022                 Response.Redirect("login.aspx");
00023             }
00024 
00025             IPrintRunRepository PrintRunRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00026 
00027             var query =  from p
00028                          in PrintRunRepository.PrintRuns
00029                          select p; ;
00030 
00031             foreach (var pr in query)
00032             {
00033                 TableCell cellView = new TableCell();                
00034                 TableCell cellstatus = new TableCell();
00035                 TableCell cellaction = new TableCell();
00036                 TableCell cellID = new TableCell();
00037                 TableCell cellName = new TableCell();
00038 
00039                 cellView.Controls.Add(getViewControl(pr));               
00040                 cellstatus.Controls.Add(getStatusControl(pr));
00041                 cellaction.Controls.Add(getActionControl(pr));
00042                 cellID.Text = pr.runID.ToString();
00043                 cellName.Text = pr.run_name.ToString();
00044 
00045                 //----
00046                 cellView.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;                
00047                 cellstatus.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00048                 cellaction.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00049                 cellID.HorizontalAlign = HorizontalAlign.Center;
00050 
00051                 //----
00052                 cellID.Width = Unit.Pixel(150);
00053                 cellName.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);
00054                 cellstatus.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);
00055                 cellaction.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00056 
00057 
00058                 TableRow prrow = new TableRow();
00059 
00060                 prrow.Cells.Add(cellView);                
00061                 prrow.Cells.Add(cellID);
00062                 prrow.Cells.Add(cellName);
00063                 prrow.Cells.Add(cellstatus);
00064                 prrow.Cells.Add(cellaction);
00065 
00066                 prrow.CssClass = "orderRow";
00067                 PrintRunTable.Rows.Add(prrow);
00068 
00069             }

00075         private Control getStatusControl(PrintRun pr)
00076         {
00077 
00078             DropDownList dropListStatus = new DropDownList();
00079             dropListStatus.ID = pr.runID.ToString();
00080 
00081             IStatusRepository statusRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IStatusRepository>();
00082             var query = statusRepository.Statuses.ToList();
00083 
00084             foreach (int statusID in Enum.GetValues(typeof(PWAS_Site.PrintRunStatus)))
00085             {                
00086                 
00087                 if ( statusID != OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED)
00088                 {
00089                     ListItem lsItem = new ListItem(statusRepository.GetById(statusID).statusName);
00090                     dropListStatus.Items.Add(lsItem);
00091 
00092                     if (pr.Status.statusId == statusID)
00093                         dropListStatus.SelectedIndex = dropListStatus.Items.IndexOf(lsItem);
00094 
00095                     if (pr.Status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CLOSED)
00096                         dropListStatus.Enabled = false;
00097                 }
00098             }
00099 
00100             if (pr.Status.statusId == OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CREATED)
00101             {
00102                 ListItem lsItem = new ListItem(statusRepository.GetById(pr.Status.statusId).statusName);
00103                 dropListStatus.Items.Add(lsItem);
00104                 dropListStatus.SelectedIndex = dropListStatus.Items.IndexOf(lsItem);
00105                 dropListStatus.Enabled = false;
00106             }
00107 
00108             dropListStatus.Width = Unit.Pixel(200);            
00109             dropListStatus.SelectedIndexChanged += new EventHandler(func_selected);
00110             dropListStatus.AutoPostBack = true;
00111             
00112             return dropListStatus;
00113         }
00114                 
00115         private Control getViewControl(PrintRun pr)
00116         {
00117             ImageButton editButton = new ImageButton();
00118 
00119             if(Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(),PWAS_Site.PwasObject.PrintRun,PwasAction.View,PwasScope.All))
00120             {
00121                 editButton.ID = pr.runID + "edit";
00122                 editButton.CommandArgument = pr.runID.ToString();
00123                 editButton.ImageUrl = "/images/left-list.gif";
00124                 editButton.Visible = true;
00125                 editButton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_View);
00126             }
00127             else if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PWAS_Site.PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction.View, PwasScope.Self))
00128             {
00129                 editButton.ID = pr.runID + "edit";
00130                 editButton.CommandArgument = pr.runID.ToString();
00131                 editButton.ImageUrl = "/images/left-list_gray.gif";
00132             }
00133             else{
00134                 Response.Redirect("index.aspsx");
00135             }
00136             return editButton;
00137         }
00138         private Control getActionControl(PrintRun pr)
00139         {
00140             Button actionbutton = new Button();
00141 
00142             if (Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PWAS_Site.PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.All))
00143             {
00144                 actionbutton.ID = pr.runID + "update";
00145                 actionbutton.CommandArgument = pr.runID.ToString();
00146                 actionbutton.Text = "Update";
00147                 actionbutton.Visible = true;
00148                 actionbutton.Width = Unit.Pixel(100);
00149                 actionbutton.Command += new CommandEventHandler(func_update);
00150             }else if(Security.IsAuthorized(getUserID(), PWAS_Site.PwasObject.PrintRun, PwasAction.Update, PwasScope.Self))
00151             {
00152                 actionbutton.ID = pr.runID + "update";
00153                 actionbutton.Enabled = false;
00154             }
00155             else
00156             {
00157                 Response.Redirect("index.aspsx");
00158             }
00159             return actionbutton;
00160         }

00163         private void func_selected(object sender, EventArgs e)
00164         {            
00165             int printRunID = System.Int32.Parse(((DropDownList)sender).ID);
00166             ViewState[printRunID.ToString()] = ((DropDownList)sender).SelectedValue;
00167         }
00168 
00169         private void func_update(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00170         {
00171             IStatusRepository statusRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IStatusRepository>();
00172             IPrintRunRepository printRun = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00173 
00174             int runID = System.Int32.Parse(e.CommandArgument.ToString());
00175             if (ViewState[runID.ToString()] != null)
00176             {
00177                 string statusName = ViewState[runID.ToString()].ToString();
00178                 Status currentStatus = statusRepo.Statuses.Single(x => x.statusName == statusName);
00179                 printRun.UpdatePrintRunStatus(runID, currentStatus.statusId);
00180 
00181                 if (OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_CLOSED == currentStatus.statusId)
00182                 {
00183                     UpdateOrderStatus_PrintRun(runID, OrderConstants.ORDER_STATUS_SHIPPED);
00184                 }
00185             }
00186             else
00187             {
00188                 Response.Redirect("index.aspx");
00189             }
00190 
00191             
00192         }
00193         
00194         private void func_View(object sender, CommandEventArgs e)
00195         {
00196             int runID = System.Int32.Parse(e.CommandArgument.ToString());
00197             Session["PWAS_run_id"] = runID;
00198             Response.Redirect("view_Single_PrintRun.aspx");
00199         }

00201         public void UpdateOrderStatus_PrintRun(int printRundId, int statusID)
00202         {
00203             IPrintRunRepository printRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IPrintRunRepository>();
00204             IOrderRepository orderRepo = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00205             
00206 
00207             PrintRun printRun = printRepo.GetById(printRundId);
00208                         
00209             var orders = from p
00210                          in orderRepo.Orders
00211                          where p.PrintRun.runID == printRundId
00212                          select p;
00213 
00214             foreach (var cur_Order in orders)
00215             {
00216                 orderRepo.UpdateOrderStatus(cur_Order.orderID, statusID);
00217             }
00218         }
00219         private int getUserID()
00220         {
00221             return (int)Session[Constants.PWAS_SESSION_ID];
